item.title: About Deepanshu
item.description: I am an Engineering Manager at Zendrive, leading the Android and iOS mobile teams. We work on analyzing driving behavior on the roads using sensors on the phone. Hopefully, by revealing peoples’s driving patterns, we can make roads safer and save some lives. It’s pretty cool, I know. I am also an Android Engineer. I started my professional career with Google, working with the Android Studio team. After working for about 4 years there, I started missing India.
